reference.title: cxxFileDetail
reference.shortdesc: Provides information about the properties of a file.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFileDetail> element provides information about the file containing the global API. Child elements describe the name, location and usage of the file.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxFile id="afile"> <apiName>afile.h</apiName> <cxxFileDetail> <cxxFileAPIItemLocation> <cxxFileDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/src/afile.h"/> </cxxFileAPIItemLocation> <apiDesc>afile.h demonstrates the simple use cxxFile and related elements.</apiDesc> </cxxFileDetail> </cxxFile>
